description: Mid-rise with a slim fit through the hip, and slight taper at the hem. Classic-looking denim with the integration of stretch, their signature gusset, and performance fibres for all-day comfort and style. Complete with temperature regulating and antimicrobial properties to stay fresh-feeling, cool and dry.
name: Duer Performance Denim Slim Jeans, 30" Inseam - Rinse - Mens
